title: Account transfer
body: Hey recently i was writing about my account not transferring from EUNE to West. Now the account i think has been transferred but there came up other problems. The account went into West where another account with the same login is sitting. It's this account yet i do not have the email for this account. I tried recovering my password for my main but i don't even get a verification for password change in my email. What should i do?

replies.body: You should get a prompt to change your username if it's already taken.  If you were in West before, then the username would revert to the original one.  If this is still an issue, hit us up through an [account recovery form](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416) and our account team can help update your info and recover the right account.
The accounts summoner name is xNeonas.
The account was stuck in East after several weeks of waiting i think support managed to transfer my account to west but i did not receive an option to change my username.
